attributes.action: Ensure that Fair Fairs remain in all major cities and towns in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Keep the traditions of hundreds of years alive in all major cities and towns across the UK. Fun Fairs should be encouraged and well promoted by local councils. Its a great form of entertainment for all the family.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
